title: Evem Config
description: For use with the Evem tool, define base config.

$schema.description: Part of the JSON Schema standard, this optional keyword declares the URL of the schema that the file conforms to. Editors may download the schema and use it to perform syntax highlighting.

commit.description: Whether to automatically submit the file changes generated by the release process

tagSeparator.description: The separator of tag. default is @

publishSync.description: Publish order is sequential or concurrent.The release will be carried out in the order of dependency

baseBranch.description: The default branch that evem change will use to calculate which package are change

bumpVersionsWithWorkspaceProtocolOnly.description: This is supposed to be used with pnpm's `link-workspace-packages: false`

ignoreDevDependencies.description: This is used to support the addition of version changes even when only devDependencies are modified

changesFolder.description: Change log storage path ,used to support custom storage directory

fixed.description: Packages that should always be released together with the same version

include.description: The files that need to be included will be found and published in the include range
